mapper.select: select t1.incomemonth as "incomemonth", right(t1.incomemonth,2) as "month", t1.income as "income", t1.lastyearincome as "lastyearincome", t1.lastyearpercent as " lastyearpercent", t2.income as "sumincome", t2.lastyearpercent as "sumlastyearpercent" from (SELECT m.`month` as "incomemonth", IFNULL(t.income,0) as "income" , IFNULL(t.income_type,4) as "incometype" , IFNULL(t.last_year_income,0) as "lastyearincome", IFNULL(CONCAT(ROUND(IF (t.last_year_income = NULL,0,(t.income - t.last_year_income) / t.last_year_income)* 100),"%"),"0%") AS "lastyearpercent" FROM tb_finance_income_month t RIGHT JOIN tb_month m on m.month=t.income_month and t.record_status=1 and t.income_type = '4' and t.income_month BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} where m.month BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY m.month) t1 RIGHT JOIN -- 总收入 同期比例 (SELECT -- * m.`month` as "incomemonth", IFNULL(SUM(t.income),0) as "income", IFNULL(SUM(t.last_year_income),0) as "lastyearincome", t.income_type as "incometype", IFNULL(CONCAT(ROUND(IF (t.last_year_income = NULL,0,(SUM(t.income) - SUM(t.last_year_income)) / t.last_year_income) * 100),"%"),"0%") AS "lastyearpercent" FROM tb_finance_income_month t RIGHT JOIN tb_month m on m.month=t.income_month and t.record_status=1 and t.income_type = '4' and t.income_month BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} where m.month BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) t2 on t2.incometype= t1.incometype ORDER BY t1.incomemonth

select SUM(t.income) as "income",t.income_typename as "incometypename" from tb_finance_income_month t where t.income_type !='4' and t.record_status=1 and t.income_month BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY t.income_type ORDER BY t.income_type

SELECT t.income_typename, t.income_type, #{startTime} as "startTime", #{endTime} as "endTime" FROM tb_finance_income_month t where t.record_status='1' and t.income_month BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY t.income_type
